ReportSection.title: End of Second Probationary Period - Tenure Awarded
ReportSection.ReportItem:
This is to inform you that the Faculty Evaluation Committee (FEC) at its meeting held on November 12 - 15 has agreed with your Department Chairâ€™s recommendation and has awarded you tenure. In accordance with its decision, your appointment has been changed from a probationary to a tenured appointment effective July 1, 2025. Your appointment will continue to be governed by the Common Agreement and Schedule A, as amended from time to time.

With the awarding of tenure your rank will be that of Associate Professor, effective July 1, 2025.

I would like to take this opportunity to congratulate you on your achievement of tenure. Thank you for your contributions to the University, and I wish you great success during the coming year.
